omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select	
	NHSNumber,
	GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
	StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
	ReferrerCode   -- Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request
FROM omop_staging.sus_APC
where NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select	
	NHSNumber,
	GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
	StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
	ReferrerCode   -- Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request
FROM omop_staging.sus_APC
where NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4258129`. Referral by

omopColumns.name: observation_date

omopColumns.name: observation_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell
dataSource.description: Records whether anaesthetic was given during Labour/ Delivery, and the type used.

	NHSNumber,

	StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
	StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
	ReferrerCode   -- Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request
FROM omop_staging.sus_APC
where NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: ReferrerCode
dataSource.description: Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request.
